title: Wildfire
lyrics:
River strong, you can swim beside it, we could
We could string some lines up the hill beside it
Tonight the moon so bright, you can drive with your head lights out
Hmmm, with your head lights out
Cause a little bit of summer's what the whole year's all about

You look fine fine fine

Put yo feet up next to mine

We can watch that water line

And get higher and higher

Oh, we'll sing sing sing

Ain't it been some kind of day

You and me been catching on like a wild fire

Like a wildfire, hey



Don't get up just to get another, you can drink from mine

We can leave each other, we can dance with the bed

You can rest your head on the shoulder if you wanna get older with me

Cause a lil' bit of summer makes a lot of history

Oh, baby!



You look fine fine fine

Put yo feet up next to mine

We can watch that water line

And get higher and higher

Oh, we'll sing sing sing

Ain't it been some kind of day

You and me been catching on like a wild fire

Like a wildfire, hey



I've got a raft from the river and my medicine bag

Oh, gotta mack five feather and my medicine bag

Yeah, yeah!



You look fine fine fine

Put yo feet up next to mine

We can watch that water line

And get higher and higher

Oh, we'll sing sing sing

Ain't it been some kind of day

You and me been catching on like a wild fire

Like a wildfire, hey
